Silk Chiffon (feat. Phoebe Bridgers)
description: A vibrant, retro-inspired video paying homage to the cult classic film *But Iâ€™m a Cheerleader*, featuring a conversion therapy camp setting and a celebratory escape to a queer bar.

title: What I Want
description: A neon-lit, high-energy video capturing the band's rebellious spirit and desire for freedom, set against a backdrop of flashing lights and urban nightlife.

title: Kind of Girl
description: A cinematic, Western-themed video showcasing the band in a desert landscape, embracing themes of self-discovery and identity.

title: I Know a Place
description: A politically charged video blending protest imagery with dance sequences, symbolizing resistance and unity.

title: Loudspeaker
description: A bold, empowering video featuring the band and their friends reclaiming space and expressing themselves freely, inspired by themes of self-empowerment.

title: Taken
description: A hauntingly beautiful video set in a desolate landscape, exploring themes of longing and emotional vulnerability.

title: Stayaway
description: A reflective video featuring the lead singer confronting her past and moving forward, capturing the essence of personal growth.

title: In My Way
description: A DIY-style video shot in London and San Francisco, showcasing the band's playful and intimate portrayal of love and relationships.

title: One That Got Away
description: A stylish, narrative-driven video set in a criminal underworld, featuring themes of revenge and empowerment.

title: Jo-Pro w/ Caleb Hearon
description: Well, well, well, look what we have here - it's the season 3 finale of Gayotic! Join the band and very special returning guest Caleb Hearon for a once-in-a-lifetime party celebrating this season AND Jo's birthday. Grab a slice of cake and settle in for a quintessential Gayotic experience before the band resumes moving in silence.
